text: If one more person interrupts me in this meeting, I swear I'll lose it
description: Meeting interruption with aggressive language - should detect Angry

text: Another call where my manager just talks over me the entire time
description: Workplace frustration with interruption - should detect Angry

text: I can't take one more deadline without proper support from the team
description: Work pressure with frustration language - should detect Angry/Strong

text: Sick of people interrupting during standups, I'm about to snap
description: Meeting frustration with snap threat - should detect Angry

text: Fed up with these all-hands meetings where nobody listens
description: Fed up + work context - borderline Angry/Sad

text: The office is so loud today, I can't focus on anything
description: Work frustration without aggressive words - may be Angry/Fearful

text: Had enough of this project, thinking about quitting
description: Had enough but more resignation than anger - may be Sad/Angry

text: Yeah, this sprint is going GREAT, totally not behind schedule or anything
description: Sarcasm + work context - should detect Angry through sarcasm

text: Oh wonderful, another meeting that could've been an email
description: Sarcastic frustration about meetings - should detect Angry

text: Checked my email and Slack, nothing urgent today
description: Low-signal work routine - should be Peaceful/Serene (None gate off)

text: Had a normal standup, went over my tasks
description: Routine work activity - should be Peaceful/Serene (None gate off)

text: Opened my laptop, checked the calendar for today
description: Mundane work action - should be Peaceful/Serene (None gate off)

text: The presentation went really well, everyone seemed engaged
description: Positive work outcome - should detect Happy/Proud

text: Got positive feedback from my boss on the project delivery
Just finished the deployment, no issues this time
description: Positive but low-key - should be Peaceful/Happy

text: Staring at the ceiling fan, coffee getting cold on my desk
description: Depressive imagery - should detect Sad even with low emotion words

text: Scrolling through photos from last year, everything felt different then
description: Nostalgic sadness - should detect Sad through context

text: Walked around the block, came back, sat down again
description: Mundane personal routine - should be Peaceful/Serene (None gate off)
